cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

project(gateway)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../../gateway")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    ./idk
    ./include
    ./src/transducer-templates/include
    ./src/transducer-transports/include
    ./things2pack/include
    ./things2pack/liquid-milk/include
    ./things2pack/liquid-oil/include
    ./things2pack/recorder/include
    ./idk/iHubble/poco-1.7.5/linux/include/Poco
    ./idk/iHubble/poco-1.7.5/linux/include
    ./idk/iHubble/zeromq-4.1.5/linux/include
    ./idk/iHubble/libmodbus-3.1.4/linux/include/modbus
    ./idk/iHubble/gsl-2.2/linux/include
    ./idk/iHubble/root-6.06.08/linux/include/root
    ./things2pack/analytics/include
    ./opc/include
    ./opc/packml/include
    ./erp/include
    ./oam/include
    .

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-std=c++11)
add_definitions(-g)
add_definitions(-O0)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(
    -DIDK_PLATFORM_LINUX
    -DIDK_PLATFORM_FAMILY_THINGS2PACK
)


# Linker options


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. -L./idk-libs/linux/lib ")

# Define the CXX sources

)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -std=c++11 -g -O0 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(gateway ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(gateway ${LINK_OPTIONS})

target_link_libraries(gateway
    curl
    microhttpd
    uriparser
    PocoNet
    PocoFoundation
    zmq
    sodium
    modbus
    pthread
    ssl
    crypto
    hdf5
    dl
    z
    gsl
    cblas
    atlas
    m
)
